website_summaries.verdict: Works on a variety of skin conditions from acne to wrinkles, but you don't get very much product for the price.
pros: Works on all skin types, including sensitive skin
Clears up blemishes, fine lines, and wrinkles
Won't clog your pores or leave your face greasy
cons: More expensive per ounce than some other products

customer_reviews.title: Fake!
customer_reviews.text: I was so worried after reading all the reviews about this product. I first tried a sample from a spa in NYC and fell in love with the results after just a few weeks. I bought this online because of the convenience and my face started breaking out a week later. Amazon, there seem to be several reviews claiming that the product is counterfeit, is there anything you do to protect customers of fraudulent products and claims?
customer_reviews.author: LEN

customer_reviews.title: Fake
customer_reviews.text: This is not the real product. I just got a sample of the actual active serum and it’s not the one. Be careful
customer_reviews.author: Gwladys

customer_reviews.title: The bottle was sealed and looked authentic; however the ...
customer_reviews.text: The bottle was sealed and looked authentic; however the color was off and the product is much different. I agree with the other reviewers--this was definitely a knockoff.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dont think its the same
customer_reviews.text: I bought one from an actual clinic before and i got this one from amazon afterward, im not really getting the same results. Booooo! I guess this is what happens when you try to find a good deal on skin care.
customer_reviews.author: Camz R

customer_reviews.title: Not the same
customer_reviews.text: I've previously used this product purchased straight from my dermatologist. I loved the product and had great results. However, after using this purchased off Amazon I did not get the same results, in fact, my skin has been broken out. I'm not sure if it is the true product, but I'm weary to order here again.
customer_reviews.author: Southernbell867

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware! Counterfeit.
customer_reviews.text: The stuff I got was NOT the real deal or it was diluted. See attached photo compared the the same product purchased from an authorized dealer - the one I bought on the left was way lighter. I LOVE this product and have been using it for a long time. It has made a huge difference. But does not work when the product isn't the real stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany F.

customer_reviews.title: Miracle Serum
customer_reviews.text: This serum really is a miracle worker. It has completely changed my skin. My acne scars and sun spots are almost gone and it has visibly reduced my fine lines and wrinkles. I have recommended this product to all my friends and they all love it! It was hard to justify the cost at first but it is worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Jen C

customer_reviews.title: I have used this product for 4-5 years. I ...
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for 4-5 years. I am constantly asked by total strangers what I use on my skin. This is a game changer. Yes, it can be hard to adjust to in the beginning; use sparingly. Perhaps every other day. I still use just a couple of drops in the tip of the dropper. Other sources are less expensive.
customer_reviews.author: S. Cotta

customer_reviews.title: Convinced it’s a fake and not worth the risk with the price!
customer_reviews.text: After receiving this everything looked legit and real however after opening it the serum looked and smelled different. I was concerned it wasn’t the real deal as this was a lot thinner almost water downed, the smell was a lot stronger and the color was completely off. Then upon further inspection between a legit bottle I had used before and this the TM (trademark) and R (registered) markings next to the name and description were missing. At this point I am convinced it’s a fake and I definitely didn’t pay fake prices so I am returning. I think amazon needs to investigate this! It’s an expensive product to not be the real deal!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cannot live without iS Clinical Active Serum!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for a few years. Previously purchased from my dermatology nurse. Of all the products I have tried over the years, this is the most impactful. Very nice light weight serum, watery but powerful, doesn’t not leave heavy residue, great to layer under other products. Great company. Great ingredients. May tingle with the first few applications. Great price on Amazon—especially love auto-shipments! 1oz lasts me approx 3-6 mo depending on usage (~4 drops, am/pm, prior to any other products).
customer_reviews.author: Maribeth Natoli Kensinger

customer_reviews.title: Vulnerable to spill. I lost so much product 🤭😩
customer_reviews.text: This is a seriously good product but I wasted at least $75 because of the vulnerable way it’s dispensed. It fell on its side 3 times!!! 😱😫No plunger- just an open bottle with dropper that’s totally spillable if it’s very expensive contents. I’m so sad!!!
customer_reviews.author: Susan J.

customer_reviews.title: almost as good as a retinol
customer_reviews.text: HOLY GRAIL of skin care, almost as good as a retinol. Keeps breakouts at bay, heals existing ones. It also assists with smoothing out your complexion, just use it consistently and you will see results
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Did not do ANYTHING.
customer_reviews.text: I used whole bottle but did not do anything and see ANY change. I don't understand why the menthol in it either. What for? Feels too harsh for the skin and did not do anything. Not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: K_Chihuahua

customer_reviews.title: Best anti-aging serum I've tried.
customer_reviews.text: Greatly diminishes age spots, smooths fine lines. I work in the salon industry and have tried a lot of serums, but to date this is the best.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: How can I have acne and wrinkles at the same time? Am I young or old? This stuff helps though
customer_reviews.text: This it is amazing! Really helps my cystic acne and breakouts. It seems a little bit watery compared to the one I had before so I’m not sure if it’s the real thing... Seems to work the same though
customer_reviews.author: shenshine55

customer_reviews.title: No dropper in box
customer_reviews.text: My order came without a dropper so using the serum is really difficult. Started using it for 2 days now only so its too soon to tell how effective it is but so far my forehead has broken into a rash (irritation) but my cheek area is super smooth. Will continue for the week to see if my skin needs a few days to get used to the product and update my review.
customer_reviews.author: Feryal Alabbasi

customer_reviews.title: Buy this item for sure
customer_reviews.text: Love this product and it really works to help with breakouts and other skin issues
customer_reviews.author: mike smith

customer_reviews.title: Acne killer - highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Helps acne. Definitely feels potent on the skin and you know it’s working. I highly recommend. Fav product tried from this line.
customer_reviews.author: rocky

customer_reviews.title: Excellent daytime serum!
customer_reviews.text: My new favorite daytime serum! You really do see a difference in your skin in just a few days. It’s amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Comeaux

customer_reviews.title: Wow
customer_reviews.text: I love this liquid. I use after using toner and moisturize ... it keeps my oil skin in check.
customer_reviews.author: Georgia Gardener

customer_reviews.title: I don’t thin this one is original!!
customer_reviews.text: I don’t think this is the original, I don’t feel the same tingling sensation in my face with the one I had before, I’m so disappointed because the price is the same👎🏿
customer_reviews.author: mari rivera

customer_reviews.title: works wonders
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! I saw improvements in my skin within a day of using it. This is a must have!!
customer_reviews.author: brandi hendrix

customer_reviews.title: Not genuine product FAKE!!
customer_reviews.text: I was duped as well. The package was sealed and everything looked genuine. But the serum was not the actual product. Do not be fooled.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Kleinschmidt

customer_reviews.title: Active serum is my favorite face product
customer_reviews.text: Active serum is my favorite face product. It has significantly reduced my pore size and helped with my acne while making my face feel soft and hydrated.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Frietch

customer_reviews.title: knockoff. not real product
customer_reviews.text: This is not the real product. This is a knockoff
customer_reviews.author: mikayla Orlan

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Total scam! This is not the real serum at all! It is either watered downed or just something different all together.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product—glad I can get it do easily on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Maeve Parrino

customer_reviews.title: FAKE PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY. This product is not a serum, it's a knock off.
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: MIRACLE PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: This product works MIRACLES!!! Worth every penny! Was skeptical about price, but my beautician pushed me to get it, and I will be forever thankful! I'm 19 years old and can have acne breakouts from time to time. I use the dropper to apply a small amount onto my face every night and sleep with it. The next morning finds my skin healed and healthier! It's amazing how this works so well! Will buy it again!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Still not totally in love with this product
customer_reviews.text: Still on the fence about this product. Haven't noticed my face being any clearer, but maybe I need to give it a bit more time. (I haven't used it more than a few weeks.) My face is definitely smoother, so I'll give it that. I'm not using this product for wrinkles, although I could see how this would be good for that.
customer_reviews.author: B. Frame

customer_reviews.title: Works wonders for acne
customer_reviews.text: This has really helped my acne. I use it with the IS clinical cleanser
customer_reviews.author: Aimee

customer_reviews.title: But I can't find anything that works better. I notice a difference if I switch to ...
customer_reviews.text: Expensive... But I can't find anything that works better. I notice a difference if I switch to something different, so I always come back to this product.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah W.

customer_reviews.title: Do NOT use this if you have sensitive skin! ...
customer_reviews.text: Do NOT use this if you have sensitive skin!!! Your entire face will break out with clear oozing burns. Then it will take weeks to heal. Tried and true.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: iS serum
customer_reviews.text: Very expensive! I have been using it for about a month, haven't noticed any change or improvement in my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Terri McCarthy

customer_reviews.title: Pricey, But Worth It
customer_reviews.text: I stopped using iS Clinical Active Serum to save money, and it was a big mistake. My hormones went through some changes and my usual clear skin started freaking out! My dermatologist gave me all kinds of recommendations, but returning to iS Clinical's Active Serum was the one product that gave me immediate improvement. I purchased a smaller bottle off of Amazon previously (from a different seller), and think it was watered down, as it did dot have as much as a tingle effect as the larger bottle does. This bottle is the read deal, and my skin is back to being manageable. It's pricey, but worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Jensen

customer_reviews.title: Med spa recommended but like the price better here
customer_reviews.text: I used to buy this st my Med spa and watched for their sales but much better value and ease of purchase here.
customer_reviews.author: CYR

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product, they use mostly natural ingredients and help my skin stay supple. It's also brightened my skin, which was a nice surprise.
customer_reviews.author: MF

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A++ Over All!! Would purchase other items in the future from seller!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great service
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this product since it works wonders for my roommate but unfortunately my skin has been very temperamental lately. The product didn't help with my acne which is what I was looking for but my skin did feel much softer. I could've gone without writing this review but I feel I need to share the above and beyond customer service I received from Shop Xperts. They were incredibly responsive to my emails and when I told them the product didn't work out for me, they sent me a return shipping label. It was the wisest transaction I've done. Like I said, my roommate loves this product, it didn't work for me but the shopper was wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: jenein j azat

customer_reviews.title: Magic in a serum. Gets rid of acne and ...
customer_reviews.text: Magic in a serum. Gets rid of acne and smooths skin texture. I use it morning and night without any issues. It works! Worth every penny, wished I heard of it sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Most effective anti-aging products I have ever used. Tingling ...
customer_reviews.text: Most effective anti-aging products I have ever used. Tingling feeling that goes away quickly, but the results are quick with my wrinkles and overall skin smoothness.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this serum. Authentic product. Will be getting more for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Toor

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! Helps me maintain an acne free face!
customer_reviews.author: Empalmer

customer_reviews.title: Very Disappointing.
customer_reviews.text: Too expensive and not effective on my oily, blemished face. Recommended by my dermatologist, and it was a disappointing experience.
customer_reviews.author: LongHairLover

customer_reviews.title: Need help
customer_reviews.text: Right now I am not sure what to think as I have been using the serum for a week and each time it feels like needle and electric stuff for two minutes in my skin then now I am pealing anyone knows if it's normal?? I try to contact is clinical but didn't help much and told me to contact my seller
customer_reviews.author: pascale

customer_reviews.title: Love it! I'm 55 years old and have no ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my go-to product. Love it! I'm 55 years old and have no wrinkles.

customer_reviews.title: Is clinical active serume ,don't go there
customer_reviews.text: The product is loaded with alcohol it is very watery and not in a serum form, after using is for just five days it blocked my pores and I got many black heads on my skin like never before ,did not help with milia at all!!!!
customer_reviews.author: SH232

customer_reviews.title: It was first recommended by my medical aesthetician and bought thru my dermatologist's ...
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this product for years now and I've seen major improvements to my skin. It was first recommended by my medical aesthetician and bought thru my dermatologist's office. I've noticed a few questions and even doubts in reviews about this product's authenticity. I thought I could shed a little light on the subject. I'm no expert but I do have experience using the product. The liquid should be clear when it is new, it only darkens and takes on a yellow hue when it's older. It doesn't affect the potency nor it's effectiveness. I hope this helps alleviate some questions or there.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Great for Maintaining a Smooth Complexion
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this Serum for years. I use it every other night. It brightens and fades spots. It has a very mild tingling effect when you first put it on. It has definitely helped me to maintain a clear complexion. A few little drops every other night goes a long way so don't let the price deter you.
customer_reviews.author: Tracey

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I've been using it for years. Reduces brown aging spots.
customer_reviews.author: L. Felton

customer_reviews.title: Aestheticians love me now
customer_reviews.text: My aesthetician said she saw a huge improvement in my skin after just a month of use. Extractions were also way easier for her. I didn't know this would happen, but my freckles almost disappeared. I've had them my whole life and have had to get use to my face without them. I've been using this for about a year now and if I get a facial by someone other than my normal person, I get tons of compliments on my skin texture and tone. This NEVER happened previously so I know this serum is what is doing it.
customer_reviews.author: hks00

customer_reviews.title: really like
customer_reviews.text: the serum is new for me application wise (previously used lotion) but i noticed improved skin clarity and similar results re: aging concerns as more expensive products. appears to tighten.
customer_reviews.author: k

customer_reviews.title: Keeps me clear......!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing....I use to buy this from my facial lady for $130! So I am thrilled to see it here for almost half the price! Clears my face and prevents breakouts!
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra M.

customer_reviews.title: I have found no other better treatment when it comes to keeping potentially cystic acne ...
customer_reviews.text: While this can often cause dryness, pealing, and stinging when applied, I have found no other better treatment when it comes to keeping potentially cystic acne at bay. It reduces blackheads and whiteheads to easily removable and hardened rather than watery infections in the skin. Worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Hayley

customer_reviews.title: Nothing bad, Nothing good
customer_reviews.text: In light of IS Clinical's sizable following, I expected extraordinary results from their Active Serum, but I used it to treat acne for months without any result. Among other things, this product is advertised as an anti-acneic solution, and I can only say that if you're looking to clear up more than a pimple or two, don't even bother with this pricey gimmick. It didn't do anything horrible to my skin, but it definitely didn't improve my skin, either. It did, however, cost me a lot of money. If you're looking for firmer skin, I can't honestly deter you from purchasing this serum, but if you're looking for clearer skin, see a dermatologist.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous!
customer_reviews.text: The entire line of IS Clinical skin care products are excellent. My skin looks and feels fantastic! I would recommend this product to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: namsdi

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: This product was recommended by a friend and I use it regularly with good results. I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Boris Berns

customer_reviews.title: IS Clinical
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Already on my 3d 1 oz bottle. Lasts 3 months which is good value. I have a combination skin type with occasional break outs + areas of hyperpigmentation. I do not have many wrinkles as yet. So the main difference I saw in overall improvement of skin quality. It cleared 99% of breakouts and made hyperpigmentation slightly less visible, though no dramatic changes here. Great overnight serum as do not need to apply anything else and skin looks and feels great in the morning. Will highly recommend this product and will start trying others from the same line.
customer_reviews.author: Inna

customer_reviews.title: Helps with Skin Clarity and Tone
customer_reviews.text: Helps keep skin clear and evens skin tone. Really like this product.
customer_reviews.author: Beachgirl5

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous serum
customer_reviews.text: Best Serum I have ever purchased. Keeps my skin clear and from being too oily during hot summer days. I definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Margo M.

customer_reviews.title: because "why would I waste my product
customer_reviews.text: I've seen a lot of reviews saying it helps clear acne. It doesn't do that. But, it does help tighten the skin and keep in moisture. The iS representative that I got my first sample from said she only washes her face at night, puts the active serum on, and gently splashes her face with water in the morning, because "why would I waste my product?" I've followed her example and really like the results.
customer_reviews.author: Katrina

customer_reviews.title: pleased
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with your service,also my wife is also pleased with your product. Steve Mayer
customer_reviews.author: steve

customer_reviews.title: SUPER serum that delivers!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this stuff for almost 2 years. I know it has made a huge difference in my skin. I get many compliments on my skin and I am 58 years old. My hairdresser said I have the skin of a 25 year old. It has minimal lines, no pores, smooth and tight. I would highly recommend this serum. With that said, I also lead a very clean lifestyle and have for many years. I'm sure this helps with the condition of my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: If you use sparingly you can really make this stuff last! My skin is brighter, less break outs and less oil!
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne Burris

customer_reviews.title: Clear Skin for real
customer_reviews.text: It's not cheap, but it does work. I've been using this serum for about a year now and can attest that it keeps my skin clearer and smoother than anything I've ever used, period. I rarely, if ever, have to use any kind of pimple cream now. Good thing is that a little goes a long way and a bottle can last for a couple of months. Use it after a good cleanser and then follow up with a good moisturizer and you'll be set.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Figueredo

product_meta.title: iS CLINICAL Active Serum
product_meta.description:
Size:0.5 OunceAn ultimate multi-tasking treatment serum, ACTIVE SERUM is clinically proven to safely improve signs of aging, acne, and hyperpigmentation. ACTIVE SERUM’s unique gentle formulation is comprised of pharmaceutical grade botanicals resulting in effective results for all skin types. Sugarcane gently increases cellular turnover resulting in a youthful glow. Arbutin, Bilberry and Mushroom extracts provide powerful skin brightening benefits for all ages and skin types. This serum smooths the appearance of fine lines and improves texture and tone, resulting in a clearer and healthier complexion. Typically used as a nighttime treatment, 3-5 drops for face and neck applied after cleansing and before moisturizing.

BRAND STORY
At INNOVATIVE SKINCARE, we are dedicated to developing clinically-validated skincare products that improve the physical & emotional well-being of people globally.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
